# Rule 3. ## Do not roleplay things others are uncomfortable with If someone is clearly uncomfortable with the direction the situation is going, give them an option to opt out of it. On the flip side, don't abuse this to get away from hostile players and then snitch on them. If someone has to opt out of a situation due to uncomfortable content, such as torture or gore, everyone should treat it like it never included their character, and that includes them .
This is NOT an ERP server. Looking for that? Search elsewhere.
